sn35.89:1.1: Atha kho ayasma bahiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma bahiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.89:1.2: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.89:4.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.89:6.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.89:9.4: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.89:11.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.89:13.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.89:15.1: “Evam passam, bahiya, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.89:15.2: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.89:15.3: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.89:15.4: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
sn35.89:16.1: Atha kho ayasma bahiyo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn35.89:16.2: Atha kho ayasma bahiyo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn35.89:16.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn35.89:16.4: Annataro ca panayasma bahiyo arahatam ahositi.
